description:
Covered persons who use the Internet

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
63931 Information and communication technology (ICT)

Definition:
The survey covered people who were aged 10 or over on 31
December of the year preceding the survey year. Questions
relating to educational attainment and employment were only
addressed to people aged 16 or over.

name: Covered persons who use the Internet
